definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: The semi-duplex work form was adopted between suspending gap sensor and control…
sentences.chinese: 而悬浮间隙传感器和控制器间则采用半双工方式工作。

sentences.english: Multi-cropping optimized and cropping density increased in wave.
sentences.chinese: 作物复种方式不断优化，复种指数呈波动式增长。

sentences.english: The rod is coiled by means of centrifugal (laying head).
sentences.chinese: 绕杆方式为离心甩头式。

sentences.english: Most global transactions are carried out by a letter of credit (LC).
sentences.chinese: 大多数全球交易都是通过信用证白勺方式完成。
这种分类方式能帮助人们节省在图书馆找资料的时间。

sentences.english: How could you have handled it differently?
sentences.chinese: 你能以不同的方式完成它么？

sentences.english: What constitutes spanking in a family can vary widely.
sentences.chinese: 每个家庭打屁股的具体方式也很不一样。

sentences.english: Lindholm says the study could be interpreted in a couple ways.
sentences.chinese: 林霍尔姆说这个研究可以通过许多方式去阐释。

sentences.english: It looks like the momentum is growing for a shift towards stream-oriented approach to UI.
sentences.chinese: 看起来UI转向面向数据流方式的势头渐劲。

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它发现它正确的表达方式。

sentences.english: That may be the best wayto incorporate your hobby into your career.
sentences.chinese: 这可能是将你的兴趣融合到工作中的最佳方式了。

sentences.english: Ramping can be applied to both offset and raster modes.
sentences.chinese: 对于偏距加工和行切加工都可以使用螺旋下切方式。

sentences.english: The first chapter mainly analyzes the modal words' position in the word class.
sentences.chinese: 第一章主要分析了方式词的词类地位。

sentences.english: Ttip the punctuated equilibrium of market economics in their favor.
sentences.chinese: 以自己的方式确定市场经济的准确平衡。

sentences.english: Theway of Americans often operated was somewhat predictable.
sentences.chinese: 美国人的行为方式或多或少还是可以预测的。

sentences.english: See if you can employ your time in a better manner.
sentences.chinese: 看看你是否能够以更好的方式使用时间。
